Scenario: The Pillar of Autumn is being invaded by The Covenant, protect it

Objective 1: Protect the Autumn Engine Room

Objective 1A: Repel Covenant boarding parties from the Autumn Escape Pod Bays

Objective 1B: Escort injured UNSC personnel to the Autumn Med Bay

Objective 1C: Defend the Autumn Armories

Twist: Captain Keyes is going down with the ship, escape the Pillar of Autumn

Objective 2: Board a Bumblebee

Objective 2A: Backup isolated UNSC personnel

Objective 2B: Sabotage the Autumn Power Substations

Objective 2C: Kill a Sangheili Zealot

Conclusion: Master Chief barely escaped
